original_title: People’s Bank branches in Hambantota to remain open tomorrow
original_body_lines: All branches of the People’s Bank within the Hambantota district will be open tomorrow (28 July), in view of the opening of Aswesuma bank accounts.
Accordingly, branches of the People’s Bank in Hambantota will be open tomorrow to facilitate the opening of Aswesuma bank accounts, the District Secretary of Hambantota confirmed.
